item.title: Trump, Putin don’t reach cease-fire on Ukraine during Alaska summit
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term, including his meeting Friday in Alaska with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Trump says Putin agrees that 2020 U.S. election was ‘rigged’
Trump appears to back off ‘severe consequences’ for Russia
Trump, Putin break off summit with no Ukraine deal as talks end early
item.description: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin took no questions after they broke off talks earlier than planned.
